hero.title: Government Services, Made Simple
hero.description: Understand government schemes, forms, and notices in your native language — safely and easily.

features.subtitle: Simple guidance • Safe access • Native language support

card1.title: Government Schemes
card1.description: We explain available government schemes and services in simple, plain language—no jargon, no confusion. Whether it's pension schemes, healthcare benefits, or financial assistance programs, we break down complex information into easy-to-understand steps so you can access what you're entitled to without any hassle.

card2.title: Form Guidance
card2.description: All guidance is available in Kannada and other regional languages for easy understanding. We provide step-by-step instructions on how to fill out government forms correctly, what documents you need, and where to submit them.

card3.title: Notice Explainer
card3.description: Learn how to identify fake messages and avoid government-related scams. We help you understand official government notices, distinguish them from fraudulent ones, and explain what actions you need to take.

card4.title: Scam Alert
card4.description: We only guide you and redirect to official government portals—no data collection. Stay safe from fraudsters who pose as government officials asking for money, OTPs, or personal information.

card5.title: Doc Updates
card5.description: We keep you informed about important document updates and renewals including Aadhaar, passport, ration card, and more.

card6.title: Help Center Locator
card6.description: Find the nearest government offices, Jan Seva Kendras, and authorized help centers in your area with accurate contact details and directions.
